General.Name: Canny Elevator Co Ltd
General.Description: Canny Elevator Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, installation, and maintenance of elevators in China. The company offers high speed, machine room less, panorama, hospital, freight, and home-use elevators; heavy-duty and public traffic type escalators; moving walks, as well as related accessories. It also provides Internet of Things equipment; special equipment; mechanical parking equipment; stainless steel steps for escalators and moving walks; key systems and components for rail transit; and electric motors, automatic control systems, elevator traction machines, and other components, as well as general cargo services. In addition, the company provides installation, modification, and repair of special equipment; decoration engineering; engineering consultation; foundation engineering; building curtain wall engineering; steel structure engineering; hoisting services; investment consulting; weight leasing services; and after-sales service and consulting services. Its products are used in residential buildings, business buildings, hotels, and shopping centers, as well as large-scale public construction projects, such as hospitals, industrial plants, subways, high-speed rail, airports, and cultural and tourism scenic spots. The company also exports its products. Canny Elevator Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
